short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight new articles on Hacker News since the last visit and highly commented articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Hacker News experience: On each reload of the front page, newly added headlines are clearly highlighted. Articles with a high number of comments are easily spotted with comment counts emphasized. Additionally, article and comment links now open in new windows, ensuring seamless browsing without losing your place.
